node.title: Melbourne Cup attracts thousands of fans back to Flemington Racecourse
node.alt: A whitebillboard with the words Melbourne Cup Carnival 2021 in black writing is attached to a gate a Flemington.
node.description: For the first time since the COVID-19 pandemic began, thousands of Melbourne Cup fans will descend on Flemington today to watch in person the race that stops a nation.
node.content:
["The roses are in bloom,\u00a0luxury dining precincts are stocked with champagne\u00a0and the lawns\u00a0will soon be scattered with punters\u00a0as Flemington Racecourse welcomes back 10,000\u00a0revellers\u00a0for the 2021 Melbourne Cup.", "After the pandemic essentially\u00a0stopped Melbourne for more than 18\u00a0months, Victoria's COVID-19 restrictions have eased just in time for the race that stops the nation.", "While 70 per cent of spectators at Flemington will be Victoria Racing Club (VRC) members, only\u00a05\u00a0per cent of tickets were offered\u00a0to the public, which equates to a few hundred ticketholders.", "The rest of the crowd will be made up of horse owners, corporate sponsors and trainers.", "\"It's the best day in Australian sport, I believe,\" VRC chief executive officer Steve Rosich said.", "", "
Spectators will be separated into three zones along the course and will not be allowed to move between zones.(ABC: Simon Gamble)
", "It will be more festive than\u00a0last year's race, when crowds were banned from attending because of Melbourne's second COVID-19 wave, but\u00a0it will still have\u00a0a different atmosphere to previous events.", "Spectators will be separated into three zones\u00a0and will not be allowed to roam around the racecourse, which has a peak capacity of 120,000 people.", "Punters must be fully vaccinated, wear a mask indoors and\u00a0be seated to eat and drink.", "\"It's been quite unusual for horses in the last 18 months in Australia,\" said jockey Craig Williams, who is riding his 19th Cup on Spanish Mission.", "\"To actually have noise and crowds and emotion at the races,\u00a0I think a lot of it is going to be a big benefit\u00a0for the horses if they can handle the day and the heat leading into the race.", "Cup fans who were not lucky enough to get a ticket can hold their own celebrations under Victoria's recently eased COVID-19 restrictions.", "Up to 10 people, including dependents, can watch the race in private homes and\u00a030 can meet for picnics and barbecues in public spaces.", "Hospitality venues such as cafes, restaurants and pubs will be open and\u00a0can have fully vaccinated, seated patrons, subject to density limits.", "Racing fan Keith Foletti has been\u00a0trackside for 85 out of 87 Melbourne Cups.", "", "
Keith Foletti will attend his 86th Melbourne Cup, only missing the years crowds were banned due to COVID and the year he was on his honeymoon.(ABC News)
", "\"I was christened at the Melbourne Cup in 1934 when the heavens opened up and I got drenched,\" he said.", "\"The only two years I've missed were the year I was on my honeymoon and last year when we were with the COVID.\"", "He said\u00a0he still didn't\u00a0mind that his honeymoon took precedence,\u00a0but one of his daughters was\u00a0within earshot when he made the comment.", "", "
Jockey Jye McNeil rides Twilight Payment to victory in the 2020 Melbourne Cup.(AAP: James Ross)
", "
Internationals to challenge local favourite Incentivise
", "The horses are scheduled to jump in race 7, the $8 million Melbourne Cup, around 3pm\u00a0AEDT.", "Star stayer Incentivise headed into the first Tuesday in November\u00a0as\u00a0the shortest-priced Melbourne Cup favourite since Phar Lap in 1929.", "It has been a rapid rise for the Peter Moody-trained gelding which\u00a0was well beaten in a maiden race at Toowoomba just seven months ago, but has\u00a0since won nine straight races.", "Last year's winner, Twilight Payment, returns for another crack.", "In 2020, the Irish gelding\u00a0dominated from the front to give owner Lloyd Williams his seventh Cup.", "The nine-year-old will\u00a0again be ridden by jockey Jye McNeil, who said he was\u00a0looking forward to racing\u00a0in front of a Melbourne Cup crowd.", "\"It'd be good to be cheered home,\" McNeil said.", "\"And, hopefully, they can give him\u00a0a cheer for last year as well.\"", "The\u00a0British-trained galloper Spanish Mission\u00a0is considered\u00a0a threat to Incentivise but\u00a0VRC's executive general manager of racing, Leigh Jordon, said\u00a0the stallion could be challenged by the\u00a03,200-metre\u00a0race length.", "\"I'm going to go out on a limb and go with Spanish Mission,\" Mr Jordon said", "\"I think he is really a top-line stayer and may [beat]\u00a0Incentivise if there is any kink in his armour.\"", "Part-owners Bray Sokolski and Ozzie Kheir bought a stake in Incentivise earlier this year but, due to\u00a0COVID-19 restrictions, will only lay eyes on the gelding for the first time in the flesh when he\u00a0runs in the Cup.", "\"That hurts, because \u2026 what we love most about racing is horses and being around them,\" Mr Sokolski said.", "\"Hopefully, when things improve, we'll be able to go to Pakenham and spend a really good amount of time with him and pat him and \u2026\u00a0give him a carrot and a kiss.", "\"That's going to be really special.\"", "", "
While limited numbers are allowed\u00a0at the racecourse, crowds are expected to celebrate as hard as ever at the 2021 Melbourne Cup.(ABC News: Margaret Burin)
", "The weather bureau\u00a0is\u00a0forecasting\u00a0a sunny day\u00a0with light winds and a maximum temperature of 30 degrees Celsius.", "Mr Jordon\u00a0says the track will receive plenty of watering before the races begin.", "\"It will be perfect by the time the Cup is run at 3pm,\" he said.", "And, after a long absence of live entertainment in Victoria, some big\u00a0names in Australian entertainment will perform around\u00a0Flemington Racecourse.", "ARIA award-winner Delta Goodrem is this year's official VRC Ambassador and the cast of Moulin Rouge! The Musical\u00a0will perform on the front lawn following the running of the Cup."]
